      • existsInSelectClause

        public static boolean existsInSelectClause​(java.lang.String cmisQuery,
                                           java.lang.String propertyId)
        Utility method to understand if a property must be indexed or not
        Parameters:
        cmisQuery -
        propertyId -
        Returns:
        TRUE if the property is included in the select clause of the query, otherwise it will return FALSE
